entry.title: Saturday: Light snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness. Light snow beginning this morning and ending this afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 32 this morning and minus 18 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Temperature steady near minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near minus 12. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Saturday 25 February 2023
